apps.name: AltStore
apps.subtitle: An alternative App Store for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
** Requires latest AltServer beta to fully work. Download from https://altstore.io/altserver/beta **

AltStore 1.3 is nearing completion, so this beta focuses on fixing the last remaining known issues with sideloading. Assuming nothing major is reported, this should be the final beta before the public release!

NEW FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Adds search bar in Browse tab
‚Ä¢ Adds Visual Studio App Center analytics for automatic crash reporting

IMPROVEMENTS
‚Ä¢ Deactivates beta apps once you are no longer a patron
‚Ä¢ Removes "Sideloading in Beta" alert

BUG FIXES
‚Ä¢ Fixes sideloading apps from News tab
‚Ä¢ Fixes missing recovery suggestions for some errors
‚Ä¢ Fixes secondary AltStore appearing after refresh under certain circumstances

NOTE: Support for 3rd party sources will be disabled in public versions of AltStore until it is finished.
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore allows you to install Delta as well as any app (.ipa) directly from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Classic Player
apps.subtitle: Turn your iPhone into an iPod Classic.
apps.versionDescription: Updated with support for Swift 4, Fixed bug where selecting a song would cause a different song to play, Fixed bug where time remaining/elapsed labels would show incorrect values, Removed support for iOS 9 (will be re-added later), Support for iOS 10 - iOS 13
apps.localizedDescription: An iPod Classic simulator for iOS

permissions.usageDescription: Classic Player needs access to your music library to control your music.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
Delta, meet melonDS! melonDS is a modern Nintendo DS emulator that is more accurate and reliable than DeSmuME. melonDS is actively being worked on and supports many features DeSmuME does not, which is why Delta now includes a melonDS emulator core üéâ melonDS will soon become the default, so please report any issues you find! 

NEW FEATURES
‚Ä¢ New core based on melonDS for DS emulation (will soon become the default)
‚Ä¢ DS settings screen to switch cores and import melonDS BIOS files
‚Ä¢ Fast forward DS games
‚Ä¢ Action Replay cheat codes for DS games (melonDS core)
‚Ä¢ Boot directly to Nintendo DS home screen and change system settings (melonDS core)
‚Ä¢ Access Delta files directory in Files > On My iPhone > Delta
‚Ä¢ Support for 8-character NES Game Genie cheat codes
‚Ä¢ Export save files for games from context menu

BUG FIXES
‚Ä¢ Fixes graphical issues when playing DS games
‚Ä¢ Fixes incorrect formatting when entering cheat codes
‚Ä¢ Fixes incorrect game name text color after deleting a game or switching cores
‚Ä¢ Fixes save files being overwritten when previewing games

Switching to melonDS has been a _big_ transition, so please report any and all bugs you find using the melonDS core. Enjoy!
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games!

DS support currently includes:
‚Ä¢ Playing DS games
‚Ä¢ Save States
‚Ä¢ Hold Button

Features I'm still working on:
‚Ä¢ Fast Forward
‚Ä¢ Cheats
‚Ä¢ Controller skin (using placeholder controller skin for now)

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Dolphin iOS
apps.subtitle: Your favorite GameCube and Wii games, now on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: Basic stuff right now. Very much still a proof of concept on Jailed devices.

apps.name: MAME4iOS
apps.subtitle: This is a port of MAME 0.139u1 for iOS, iPadOS, and tvOS.
apps.versionDescription:
Added in 4K/UHD MAME render resolution support so that MAME artwork looks much better. 
‚Ä¢ Added in iCade support for tvOS. 
‚Ä¢ Steam Controller support, controller must be in bluetooth mode and paired. 
‚Ä¢ Fixed issue where audio would stop when playing back content from another source or being interrupted by a phone call. 
‚Ä¢ Set the audio catefory to AVAudioSessionCategoryAmbient so MAME4iOS will play nice with other audio apps. 
‚Ä¢ Make the üÖê üÖë üÖß üÖ® layout consistent across iPhone and iPad. 
‚Ä¢ Added a Nintendo Button Layout option. if enabled the üÖê üÖë and üÖß üÖ® buttons will be swapped to match a Nintendo layout. This option has no effect on a custom layout, or a physical game controller. 
‚Ä¢ Better handling for 2 Player games, a 1 Player and a 2 Player Start option will be on the in-game menu. We try to detect how many Players, Inputs, and Coins the current game is looking for and try to adapt to that. 
‚Ä¢ Downgrade controllers, if you are trying to use Controller 3 on a game that only takes 2 inputs, Controller 3 will be mapped to Player 1. 
‚Ä¢ Controller Identify, when you hit MENU on a controller the Player number is displayed as the title of the in-game menu. 
‚Ä¢ Supports Controler trigger buttons L2, R2. MENU+L2 will Insert a P2 COIN, and MENU+R2 will do a P2 START. 
‚Ä¢ Removed separate Load State and Save State from the in-game menu, to make room, the menu is cramped in landscape and tvOS 
‚Ä¢ üÖë will exit a MAME menu. 
‚Ä¢ Added support for HISTORY.DAT and MAMEINFO.DAT. you can import a .ZIP file containing the files or manualy copy files into dats directory.
apps.localizedDescription: MAME stands for Multi Arcade Machine Emulator, and lets you play arcade games from the past 30+ years on a device that fits in your pocket! .

apps.name: Play!
apps.subtitle: PlayStation 2 Games on iOS.
apps.versionDescription: Account for textures with 0 buffer width
apps.localizedDescription:
Play! is a portable PlayStation2 emulator. The focus of the project is on making PlayStation2 emulation easy and accessible. Just pop in your favorite game's disc and have fun!

‚Ä¢ No BIOS required. Play! is an high-level emulator.
‚Ä¢ Easy configuration. No custom settings to fix specific games.
‚Ä¢ Available on many platforms. Making sure the experience is the same everywhere.

apps.name: PPSSPP
apps.subtitle: PlayStation Portable Games on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription:
PPSSPP allows you to play PSP games on your iOS devices.

Enhance your experience!
‚Ä¢ Play in HD resolutions and more
‚Ä¢ Play on a tablet for big-screen mobile gaming
‚Ä¢ Customize on-screen touch controls or use an external controller or keyboard
‚Ä¢ Save and restore game state anywhere, anytime
‚Ä¢ Crank up the anisotropic filtering and texture scaling
‚Ä¢ Continue where you left off by transferring saves from your real PSP
